# pauseButton

**Instance Property**

The pause button for a countdown timer.

## Declaration

```swift
var pauseButton: AlarmButton?
```

## Discussion

If you specify, the countdown includes a pause button when presented by the templated UI.

## Creates a pause button

- **init(title:pauseButton:)**: Creates a countdown with an optional pause button.
- **title**: The title of the countdown.
